description:
encoding/json: don't match field name if a JSON struct tag is present.

Fixes issue 3566.

messages.text:
*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=dc7105ff6cbb ***

encoding/json: don't match field name if a JSON struct tag is present.

Fixes issue 3566.

R=rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6139048

I struggled a bit to parse your request, so I'm not sure that I
satisfied it. PTAL.

Hello rsc (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM

Please add two more fields to that test struct, one that is only named
via its tag name, and one that is only referred to (but not named,
thanks to your fix) by its long name.
I just want to see the simpler cases tested too.

subject: code review 6139048: encoding/json: don't match field name if a JSON struct ...
